nodes.name: A Sinking Feeling
nodes.summary: No longer can you swim in heavy plate; now your armour, equipment, or carried items drag you down while swimming. Options exist for formulas based on equipped armour weight class, total equipment weight, or encumbrance percentage.

nodes.name: Morrowind Containers Animated - Edited for Quickloot
nodes.summary: Animates containers when you look at them, rather than when you activate them. Make sure you enable Quickloot mode in the MCM.

nodes.name: No More Friendly Fire
nodes.summary: Stop friendly fire. Player companions can't damage the player, the player can't damage companions, and companions can't damage each other. Option to stop combat from occurring between friendly actors. That's it.

nodes.name: Pluginless and Adjustable Lower First Person Sneak
nodes.summary: Lower first-person sneak, but without a plugin, and adjustable on the fly. Made with MWSE-Lua.

nodes.name: Door Randomizer
nodes.summary: Randomizes the destination of all cell-change doors. Configuration options such as: randomize chance; pick only cells of type: interior, exterior, both, or match original destination; only pick cells that have a door to place the player

nodes.name: More Attentive Guards
nodes.summary: Guards with some actual spatial awareness! An MWSE-Lua mod that replicates Inquisitive Guards by RubberMan and Protective Guards by Fliggerty. Guards that catch the player sneaking about in town will follow them for a length of time

nodes.name: Keyboard Layout Changer
nodes.summary: Allows the use of non-qwerty keyboard layouts in any in-game text input. Currently supported: Dvorak, Colemak, and Workman (US and UK variants).

nodes.name: More Choppin' Axes
nodes.summary: Modifies axe damage values so that chop is used by default if "Always Use Best Attack" is on. Because axes should chop, right? Doesn't change anything that already chops by default.

nodes.name: Activate With A Click
nodes.summary: Activate/interact with a click of the mouse, because simply mapping activate to a mouse button doesn't work when activating objects that are made interactive by an MWSE Lua script. Fixes interactivity with objects such as wells and kegs in
